values:
yup. this is dumb. annonymous posters and shit. ah! i have an idea.

 

why don't you just write every little thing you have a problem with me down RIGHT HERE? go ahead. comment. tell me why you dislike me. tell me why i'm a slut, whatever. i don't care.

 

it's just dumb to leave it on baba's journal.

Everytime I say I'm gonna quit smoking, I always seem to forget the point. I want my bloody cigarettes. I want to die of lung cancer. I just want a cigarette....



I'm having a bad day. It's tired. And bad. And has included lots of crying. And letter writing. And more crying. I want a cigarette.



I'm sad. Very sad, actually.




And I don't know what to do.

i made up a song. :-D


i want my cigarette!
i WANT my cigarette!
i need my nicotine!
cuz i'm a fucking fiend!
and i'm gonna fucking kill you.

oops. i have to go.
WTF? Why is Arthur's Journal blocked?
Either I have to give up my own work, resign from my post, and give it up to her or make half the school hate me because i would have fired the very person that so many guys love.

What Is Your Battle Cry?

Lo! Who is that, stalking out of the steppes! It is Justpleaseaskme, hands clutching buzzsaw hand extensions! And with a low howl, her voice cometh:

"You in some shit now, muhfuh! I plunder like a river of pure piranha!!!"

Find out!
Enter username:
Are you a girl, or a guy ?

created by beatings : powered by monkeys
yesterday was the worst day i've had in a while. fuckin people.

So, the trip with Sammo was great (I only hope I didn't drive her nuts). We went jetskiing on Saturday and I met a guy named John. Unfortunately, he goes to my school's rival school. Napa. Can you believe it. Gah. Anyway. I'm writing a song. It's weird. but apparently not bad. But I'm not gonna write it in here. Muahaha.
i have a sick, empty feeling inside right now. i don't like this. i don't like this. i don't like this. i can't handle this.
today wasn't too bad... some parts really sucked... i ended up crying, which was nice. but... some was good too. miles singing that one song by fall out boy is priceless though. gah... i feel poo-y.
I wouldn't love you if you paid me (you're fucking disgusting) I wouldn't touch you if you made me (your lies can't fuck me) You're another regret under my pillow Another wish I wish I hadn't made

YES!! I GOT FALL OUT BOY FINALLY!



i ♥ Cassi!

I don't care if I have been having rows with my friend and having things be awkward, today was fucking awesome. Parts of it fucking sucked, like Mari telling me I'm doing something wrong, and then as soon as she leaves, Best tells me to do what I was doing before. My computer being totally fucked up didn't help either. And... awkwardness with someone doesn't make me happy. But here's what DID make me happy. A good session of ChemComm, meaning I understand it! (It won't last so I'm just gonna be happy now.) Psychology was absolutely great, man. Office T.A. isn't my favorite, but it wasn't too bad either. Lunch with Beth (  ♥  ), Danny, Mike, and Taylor was great. Slurpies and chips. Muahaha. After lunch was Spanish, and I didn't even mind it! SCORE. Then there was English which was completely awesome. I  ♥  that class. Boonchouy rules my world. Then I thought Cassi was meeting me after school, but apparently NOT. So, that wasn't too hot. I went to my P.E. meeting and got the stuff. And then I had a weird conversation with Miles about sex, religion, homosexuality, and computers. Overall, my day fucking rules. MUAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAAHAHAAHAH.

so i took out my last entry because i'm being a fuckign cow, an attention whore, and i fucking hate that. so i'm gonna write in my personal journal when i'm mad. or upset. or crying. or whatever. this just isn't worth it.

Three things:


Danielle angry is one of the scariest things I've ever encountered. She was ranting and raving (in a Danielle sort of way so she wasn't violent or anything but she does drive about five to ten miles faster then she would normally) and wow... scariness. I mean it as a compliment.


Billy needs to go back to normal. Him being the way he is now... I'm not sure what that is... I don't like it. I'd so prefer him being mad or something. Just not... I don't know... more lifeless then usual? I don't know what to call it, but it's like he's less Billy-like. It's kinda sad.


Miles made my day today. Just by talking... And falling off his board. :)

Today was better then yesterday. I got seriously disrespected today and I'm not about to forget it. Also, I'm still perturbed from yesterday, but what can I say? The end of my school day made it better, and I feel better. My schedule as of now:

1) US/American History
2) Chem/Comm
3) Psych
4) T.A in office
5) Spanish 3
6) English
7) FREE PERIOD

I talked to Miles again today and he now reminds me of how he was yesterday. I like him better when it's just us talking. He's funny. :)

You know. I just thought of something. I'm not going to quit smoking. Do you know why? The person I promised I would quit smoking can't even say HELLO to me during the day of school.



FUCK that.
OMG, TODAY WAS GREAT. My classes were awesome, and I met a boy. ;)

The great parts of my summer (not in any particular order):

-Having Colleen and I get along for a few weeks so she can stay at my house. ;)
-Going to Oregon
-Having mud, chocolate, and shaving cream fights there
-Getting the new HP with Reno
-Sean staying in Davis for a few weeks
-Stealing Josh's stuff & seeing his baby sister and mom again
-Steven's Party (only because his mom is COMPLETELY FUCKING INSANE, and I had a lot of friends there)
-REDOING MY ROOM (though getting in a fight and losing to a paint can was not ideal)
-Getting along with my dad
-The view in Hawai'i

 

Not so cool:

-My birthday
-Not hanging out with Danny G enough
-Hawai'i vacation with parents and brother
-finding out not-so-nice things about my brother

 

I know there are other things I did on the good side, but I can't remember them. I have never had such a great summer. All my other ones have never, EVER been good, even remotely in comparison... well, even without comparing they all fucking sucked.

But it's over, and that's fine... I just hope next summer is good.

 

 

HAPPY BIRTHDAY, belated-of-course, TO MARIE GALO.
Can anyone tell me why the apparent Evan the fuckface, asshole, fucker (depending on who said it) cancelled the show last night? I'm not getting anything.

I had some weird dreams last night... but i don't remember all of it.


I was going through some tunnels to a parking lot... Then I saw Reno in a parking garage... I went to a condo and sat and watched the view in Hawai'i... Then my little brother was an infant... And then Sammo turned Nora into a cat.



Gah... I'm tired.
*falls over like japanese people in anime*

http://zoid.pcplayground.com/socinet/


You should sign up. It's nifty. It tells you who's in your classes. DaVinci Students go to the bottom of the list for classes. Go. Do it. Then tell me your err...whatsitcalled. Ummm... username! that's what it is. Alright. Go now.




I'm msmousesuicide.

I might be actually getting used to the color in my room. Lots of pink, I can tell you that much.

 

I wish I could have gone shopping more then I did... but oh well. I got some stuff and that's good enough for me, I think.

 

Gah. I don't know what else to write.

1st--US/American History
2nd--Chem/Comm
3rd--Psychology
4th--FREE (AHHAHAHAHAHAHAH.)
LUNCH
5th--Spanish 3
6th--English/American Lit.
7th--T.A. for Office
8th--Individual P.E.

Reno's is:

1st--US/American History
2nd--Health
3rd--Psychology
4th--FREE
LUNCH
5th--FREE
6th--English
7th--Algebra 2/Trig
8th--Individual P.E.

 

Wanna know something cool? Individual P.E. means that I can get credit for doing P.E. without being at school. I got RENO to join Rugby as long as I do tennis. Where the fuck do I sign up for that? SCORE. I like this.

Oh yeah. I'm repainting my room. Which means I have to take the lipstick off the walls. Bummer. And Josh's phone number. And Anthony being a whore. Hahahahah. It's going to be pink. Three different colors of pink.

Yeah. I'm gonna go stuff the stuff in some bags and start on my room.

*sigh* So...

I'm repainting my room as of tomorrow. I'm making Reno help me (she offered, really) after we go and get our schedules.

I'm exhausted.

I went shopping today. It was only the first four hours of it, I'm not even done. I got trousers (the over-all kind), a REALLY cool lamp, a nifty dress, another in corderoy, and a slip thing for the presentation clothes i got in Hawai'i. I also got a dress in Hawai'i.

Reno: Choose which one of those presents you want.

Sammo: Before I give you yours, promise me you'll wear it to school.

Other people who I got stuff for, BLAGH. You might have to wait til school to get it.

 

Registration is tomorrow.

 

 

 

Have you ever heard of anyone who had a bad trip to Hawai'i? Well, I have. I am that person.

i need two cds. mae and fall out boy.



anyone have them?

i wish i could cry. maybe cut, too. i could do both at the same time, even. but i'm not going to.

 

i'm not considered as a human here. i'm so emotionally exhausted now. i can't handle this anymore. i'm stuck here for a week... and i can't do anything.

 

that just made it worse. i confined my deepest pains in someone, things i don't really tell anyone, and he didn't seem to believe me on something small so what else doesn't he believe me on? what the fuck? thanks a lot.  i feel SO much fucking better.

 

when i get back, i wanna get drunk. i'm going to. i'm going to be pathetic and lame and be like everyone else who doesn't want to deal with their bullshit lives with their bullshit problems because i'm just the same. i don't know why i write in this journal. i'm pretty sure no one reads.  says it's a boost in self esteem, but i've never found it to be that way. or maybe i read what she said wrong. i'm bound to do that.

 

what am i saying? i'll just do it now.

So... i'm in Hawai'i.

Here's some random pictures!

That's from my sillyness day of my birthday. Reno, Debbie, Josh and Anthony came over to goof off a little bit. There you go.

Hawai'i state park. (it was windy...)

near north shore...

reno... i know how you feel. different, of course... but i do understand.



i don't know why i feel this way, but i do want to change to be someone else. i can't be myself anymore because i don't know who i am and i can't tell if i have ever been a good person. i've made mistakes, a million, but how can i fix what's already happened? everyone makes mistakes, some bigger then others, and if they don't know that it's going to happen... i can tell you, you're in for a big surprise. you feel awful for it... and i do. i feel awful. i can't change what i've done.

i'm having a fight in my head right now. i want to change to be someone else. but is it even possible? can i be who i want to be? what reprocussion would there be because of this change? i don't know. i need to find out. the only way i can find out is to change now and find out. i need to change. i can't stay this way forever. i can't be this way. i can't do this anymore. i don't feel myself anymore. i don't... i can't take this anymore.

i haven't hated myself for a while. but i do now. again. over and over again. what am i supposed to do now? i can't do this now... i can't.



you know, i don't even know what i'm saying. i guess all i'm saying is that i feel bad for things i can't fix... and i feel terrible for it.

Gah. What a GREAT week. My birthday... ehhh. I don't feel like talking about that one. LA...the most exciting thing that's happened here is that I got a hookah. I've had...a bad day. I woke up with no one home. No one was in the Hotel, and more then that, I couldn't find a fucking note from my parental or even any fucking food. She decided to keep the car another day, even though we have no money to spend anymore, and stay another night in LA. She found a place to work. Now all she needs is a place to live. I took a shower and then started coughing up a pretty good amount of blood. Got out and called Colleen because...I don't know why. Mom and Mema came back around THREE. I had coffee and then we went to go pick up Trevor so that we could bring him back for Mema to see. Instead... we hung around the frat house. I went looking through my brothers stuff and then he pulled me aside to tell me a fat secret that only our parents don't know. All of his friends at the frat house know. Everyone else knows. He can't afford to buy his own groceries, even though he has a job, so he does things I don't approve of but I had to pretend to understand anyway. I can't tell him not to do it because he doesn't have enough money... So I'm sending him all of my allowance plus birthday cash so he can maybe knock it off a bit. I really hope... Dad won't give him money. He's screwed because he won't come back so he won't have to deal with a fucked up family and fighting parents. He bought me lots of things for my birthday and I've already paid for half by slipping money in his pocket. Gah. Urban Outfitters makes me feel bad about myself. I did get some things, granted, but I looked like shit in everything else. I'm NEVER going back in there. The mirrors... the clothes... I felt like shit. I feel like shit. And for those of you who I don't feel like naming or even if I don't know about you thinking this, I'm not asking you to tell me I'm pretty. I'm stating a fact that I don't fucking feel pretty so don't even. I will fucking rip you apart. I will pwn you. Anyway... HAPPY BIRTHDAY MARIE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Oh yes. Before bed I must inform you. There is to be no party for me. Colleen doesn't want to. So, it's over. Fuck it anyway, everyone is gonna be gone so there's really no fucking point of bothering.

It pisses me off a lot though. I've given parties to my friends countless times, but I never get one back. How the fuck is this fair?

I'm gonna go on, watch fight club, and pretend this whole BAILING thing doesn't bother me.


Stay constant. I can't handle you any other way.

Okay... So... Today has been interesting... and it includes an ASSTRAY OF DEATH.







GAH.









I hate being emo.

Jesse, Reno, me, and Oli on Harry Potter night!

Reno just can't resist me! (and the other way around!)

This is like... the best picture of Sean I took in Davis.

Me looking irritated in the Hotel on HP night.

Mud fight in Oregon!!!!!

Oregon is quite nifty, you know...

Nora... I didn't think it was possible, I really didn't. Not that I thought you were lying, I just didn't know. But now I do.

How can someone be in love with two people at once? How can I be in love with two people at once? I didn't think I could love one.

Two very, VERY different people.

One is like... different. He gets jealous. He can be really sweet and nice, and we can also play around. Lots of weird playing. He's got a temper sometimes, or he can. But he took me for granted. Hmm... I can still love him and do nothing about it and I might be planning to do just that. I don't know though. I could let my once broken heart heal and then fuck it up once again. But can I really let myself do that? Or can I really deprive myself of what I really want?

The other one... He never gets jealous and he believes in no sex til thatthingimsoneverdoing. He's really, REALLY sweet and overly nice all the time. He's a real gentleman. He treats me like I'm worth everything to him. He's always loved me like that and he's never treated me otherwise. He wants our relationship to be how it was. We kiss, we play... and when I get back to California he wants me to be dating other people... even though he knows how much I'm gonna miss him. It's not like he's gonna go after other girls either because he's made it clear which one he wants.

 

The problem is... I love both of them so much... I shouldn't... But I do.

 

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

So anyway. I'm in Oregon. Things are really going great, but I also want to be at home. I miss California and all of my friends. Yes, I MISS YOU. Punkards. Anyway. It's nice weather here. I like Sean. He cracks me up. First day Sean and

 

I didn't get to finish that because Sean came upstairs with a mask on and I screamed bloody murder. And then he like... tackled me. It was funny.

Sean and I on the first day went with his youth group buddies and played Capture the Flag for like FOUR HOURS. Personally, I think it would have been better if I was in California and I had fast runners on my team. Hahaha. I know who I'd pick, too.

Second day we went to the pool, I think, and goofed off. It was totally great.

Third day... which was yesterday... what did I do? Oh. We went off to a river thing, A COLD ONE, and a lake and goofed off, it was really great.... :)

Today... We're going to a concert. mewithoutyou at Club Meow Meow. This cracks me up. I love Oregon...except for the bugs.

 

Btw, VINCE. I hope you read this. Project 86. Look 'em up. It's a rock group. You'd like it. Really. And... trust me.

 

 

 

NO CIGARETTES FOR GEN!

 

 

She hasn't even had one...

In the middle of a gun fight
In the center of a restaurant 
They say, "Come with your arms raised high!"
Well, they're never gonna get me
Like a bullet through a flock of doves
To wage this war against your faith in me 
Your life will never be the same
On your mother's eyes, say a prayer, say a prayer

[chorus] 
Now, but I can't 
And I don't know 
How we're just two men, as God had made us
Well I can't, well I can
Too much, too late, or just not enough of this 
Pain in my heart for your dying wish
I kiss your lips again

They all cheat at cards and the checkers are lost
My cellmate's a killer, they make me do push-ups in drag
But nobody cares if you're losing yourself
Am I losing myself?
Well, I miss my mom
Will they give me the chair
Or lethal injection, or swing from a rope if you dare
Ah, nobody knows all the trouble I've seen

[chorus] 

To your room
What they ask of you 
Will make you want to say, 'So long'
Well, I don't remember
Why remember you 

Do you have the keys to the hotel 
Cause I'm gonna string this motherf*cker on fire (fire)

Life is but a dream for the dead
And well I, I won't go down by myself
But I'll go down with my friends
Now now now now...now now now...now now now!!

I'm really nervous about going tomorrow. I don't know why exactly. I guess I just felt like it was weeks away, but now it's here... and it's tomorrow morning. I leave in less then 12 hours. Ahg. I've packed and repacked about 3 times.

Well... isn't this uncomfortable? I think so.... Yes.

But today was kind of an uncomfortable day in itself. I woke up and hung out with Sean and Vince. Then I went to you-know-where for people who know my part schedule on Wednesday. THAT was crap, kinda, too. Then I had Colleen over and she helped me pack and repack and eat pizza. And then Sean came over and we all watched Shanghi Knights which was kinda funny and then Colleen left. Sean told me that of course ASHLEY told him (telephone) that I was ALL over Josh when I went over to his house. She's a fucking pain in the ass sometimes. I don't know why she'd say that.

Anyway... Beyond feeling nervous, I'm slightly upset, and tired. Completely exhausted, really.

I have a song stuck in my head.


i hate everything about you
why do i love you?



but it could go both ways.

I have a lot of trips planned! GO ME.

  • July 21st-28th Oregon
  • August 5th-8th Los Angeles
  • August 13th-20th Hawai'i

Ten points for Griffindor!

 

But in the time I'm here, there are a few people I would be keen on to hang out with! Sammo, Reno, the boys, Steven, Kelsey (before you leave for a FUCKING YEAR), Nora, MARIE GALO, and maybe even Vincent.

and so did you

i'm just blind, i'm blind
i can't even get you to talk to me

i used to love you and you did me
yeah, you did me
you screwed me over

i can scream this to your face
and i bet you wouldn't hear me
i'll scream the words, i'll scream them
you still don't hear me
you can't fucking hear me anymore

it was sweet to begin with
but things like that don't last
how can they with you in my past?

as i move on i can't help but think

mine heart won't mend

but for you to know i loved you
is tearing me apart

pretend falling in love didn't hurt
pretend i never did
and move on...

i can scream this to your face

you still don't hear me

me...

and i'm nothing more
then a good fuck

i can scream this to your face
and i bet you wouldn't hear me
i'll scream the words, i'll scream them
you still don't hear me

for you

if you wanted me to

you love me and you don't
pretend, pretend, pretend

a past which lies
and so did you
what am i supposed to believe?

i can't even get you to talk to me

i used to love you and you did me
yeah, you did me
you screwed me over...

This past week has been interesting. VERY interesting. Sean has been here for about a week now. And know what, know WHAT? I might be going back to Oregon. And then I'll be going to LA. (Steven. For my birthday this still means you're taking Reno and I on a double date with you and Jonas even if I'm not going to be there on my birthday.)

I've been staying in a hotel all weekend. Fucking cousins. I hate my cousins but I was forced to see them two days in a fucking row. Friday, I went to Charlie and the Chocolate factory with Baba and then to dinner with the Rentals and then to Borders for Harry Potter. Saturday Sean and I made plans for EARLY, EARLY in the morning like 8:30 and hung out until 12. We went around to the campus and then off the the arboritum or however you spell it. It was... really cool... And then my day got ruined by going over to my cousins. I read Harry Potter and took a nap (which is great). Then I went out with Colleen to Borders and Jamba Juice. Sunday, which was today, I had to see my cousins again. Then... Did Seans party thing today. (I couldn't get ahold of you, Reno, so don't hate me.) It was alright. No one ate anything except those GREAT cupcakes that Sammo made. (Ashley has a FAT crush on Josh and therefore was being a bad hostess.) We went into Manor and goofed off. Played some football or whatever in water and that was cool except for the fact that John was like... trying to kill me with the fucking football. After we were done with that we went over to Josh's and then over to Ashley's and then we had to leave her house, so I went over to Josh's again. Josh and I hung out for a little bit until Anthony and Oli (who fucking bit me really hard... not that it was bad, actually, but it was on Harry Potter night) came over and we started watching Blade II, which was okay. Sean came over, too and we all just sat around eating REALLY FUCKING BRILLIANTLY GOOD pizza and watching that.

I got a lot of crap today from almost everyone about Sean. How am I supposed to know if I'm in some sort of relationship that isn't friendy with him if he doesn't tell me?! I still don't know... I'm almost afraid to ask. Apparently Ashleys dad was asking him about me. *embarrassed face* And I guess the only reason I'm comfortable writing about this stuff (mainly, guys) in my journal is because I know they (or he) doesn't read it. Muaha. Otherwise I'd feel like a dumbass.

Oh yeah. Out of today I gained a fat cut on the back of my heel, two shirts that aren't mine (one about girls and then another called hmmm...."HOOTERS") and they are Josh's, two ps2 video games (that i REALLY want to play and) that I have to give back, two cds that I'm burning and a pair of pants. These are guy pants. They were Joshs pants but Joshs mom said I had to have them because my "butt looks good in those." Haha, Joshs mom is so cool. So is his little sister! She's three now! She's so cute...So big, too. She's grown up a lot since I've seen her.

It feels good to be hanging out with guys again. I like being around guys because a) I can steal their clothes and mostlikely fit into them, b) they're not high matinence or however you spell it, and c) they kinda just except you for who you are, mistakes and all... or most of them do.

And now I'm gonna go off with my brand SPANKIN new journal and update the things I think people don't want to read in here.

...

I smell like Josh.

I have had no internet or phone line for over 24 hours. Do you know how crazy that made me?!

I don't remember much of yesterday. Apparently I passed out. And got yanked inside. Well. I woke up at 6. Er... In the afternoon.

I kinda wanna kill Ashley's dad right about now. He cancelled the party. Even though he knew about it a week ago. He decided to take the family on a trip.

SDASKFNALSKDNKLASDNSKD.

I'm just in a bad mood anyway. I think I'm gonna go eat those silly little oreos that I bought for the party. Chick food.
I had a few dreams last night. I don't remember all of them. But I know I don't like them.
That reminds me. I'm never letting Connor hug me again. I smell like guy. Not that I mind, really, it smells good. It just smells better on someone who isn't me.

He's really gentlemanly. Yeah, I know I'm supposed to be like... non-traditional like... but see, it's really nice to have someone doing the whole traditional type thing. Opening doors, paying for stuff, being overall completely nice, and giving me a hand down from a fence (:)). It was nice. The whole evening was great. It's nice having him to myself again. It used to be like that all the time and ... then he moved. He really is a great guy. Last night I went through all the letters he gave to me. I never appreciated him enough. Or at all.

Shavaun moved, btw. To Santa Barbara, or Santa something or other. It's really depressing.

Went to the pool with Mitali today to meet Andy. Met up with Conner and stuff. Am going thursday to see Connor and Runyon in the same place at once.

Haha, thought of something. If I keep hanging out with Sean as much as I am, I may end up as a *gasp and sour face* NON-SMOKER. He got in town on Sunday, and it's tuesday now. I've smoked about... 2 sunday. 3 yesterday. and a half of one today. GO ME. But I think I don't mind.

How strange.

Today. Tonight. Everything. wonderful!! As I've said before...

 

                                                  i could die.
